title: Riot, when do you predict we'll get the personal shop back?
body: I know it's because of the client you are working on, but do you think 6 months? a year?

replies.body:
No idea! I'd be pretty pumped if it came back, though, because I'd like to pick up a few nice skins at a discount! :)

Keep an eye on the [**News Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for any official announcements for sales or personalized store offers.
